:::config { "language": "alpine", "theme":"material-theme-palenight" }
<div x-data="{ }" x-on:click="console.log('testing')"></div>

<p x-html="{
    prop: "Testing",
    init() {
        this.isPrettyNeatRight();
    },

    test() {
        console.log('testing');
    },

}"></p>

<script>
    document.addEventListener('alpine:init', () => {
        Alpine.data('dropdown', () => ({
            open: false,

            toggle() {
                this.open != this.open
            }
        }))
    })
</script>

:::expectation

<pre><code data-theme='material-theme-palenight' data-lang='alpine' class='phiki language-alpine material-theme-palenight torchlight' style='background-color: #292D3E;color: #A6ACCD;--theme-selection-background: #00000080'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; </span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">21</span><span class="token">                </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">this</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">open</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">!=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">this</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">open</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">22</span><span class="token">            </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">}</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">23</span><span class="token">        </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">}</span><span class="token" style="color: #f07178;">))</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">24</span><span class="token">    </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">}</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">)</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">25</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: #f07178;">script</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&gt;</span><span class="token">
</span></div></code></pre>
